thread.title: Next big corporate step for cannabis biz: Weed commodity trading
thread.title_full: Next big corporate step for cannabis biz: Weed commodity trading - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joe Garofoli
title: Next big corporate step for cannabis biz: Weed commodity trading
text:
For another sign that the multibillion-dollar cannabis industry is becoming more corporate as it surfaces from the underground, look no further than Eddie Miller’s plan to start a marijuana commodities exchange next year in Colorado.
For another sign that the multibillion-dollar cannabis industry is becoming more corporate as it surfaces from the underground, look no further than Eddie Miller’s plan to start a marijuana commodities exchange next year in Colorado.
